content: I ate some duros while reading about my favorite dinaosaurs today. Unfortunately, the book did not include Ichthyosaurus, but Talarurus also seems really cool. It was nice. I also got the answer that I now have a job this summer. But as you know I won't tell you what company it is. Feel free to try to figure it out!
pictures: A picture of the dinosaur Ichthyosaurus.

content: I never told you, but my favorite dinosaurs are Aardonyx, Datanglong and Ichthyosaurus.
